title: Build Your Own
description: Create a new table to store vehicle registration data for the city.
story: The city needs a new system to track vehicle registrations. Create a table called 'vehicles' with columns: id (SERIAL PRIMARY KEY), plate VARCHAR(20), owner VARCHAR(100), model VARCHAR(100), year INT.
hint: CREATE TABLE vehicles (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, plate VARCHAR(20), owner VARCHAR(100), model VARCHAR(100), year INT);
tableSetup: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS vehicles CASCADE;
